  • Exports

Helper utilities for running nimble tasks

Imports

hshell, oswrap, colorlogger, htemplates, hstring_algo

Types

TaskRunConfig = object
  hrefPref*: string
  outDir*: AbsDir
  nimdocCss*: AbsFile
  testRun*: bool
  logFile*: AbsFile
  projectDir*: AbsDir
  packageName*: string
  version*: string
  author*: string
  description*: string
  license*: string
  srcDir*: string
  binDir*: string
  cmdOptions*: seq[ShellCmdPart]

Consts

cdMainProject = "cd /project/main"

proc runDockerTest(projDir, tmpDir: AbsDir; cmd: ShellAst;
                   runCb: proc () = (proc () = discard );
                   envpass: openArray[tuple[key: ShellVar, val: string]] = @[]): void {...}{.
    raises: [OSError, IOError, Exception, ValueError, OSError, Exception], tags: [
    WriteDirEffect, ReadDirEffect, RootEffect, WriteIOEffect, ReadIOEffect,
    ShellExecEffect, ExecIOEffect, ReadEnvEffect].}
Copy project directory projDir into temporary tmpDir and execute command cmd inside new docker container based on nim-base image.

proc getNimbleDump(pkg: string): Config {...}{.

proc makeLocalDevel(testDir: AbsDir; pkgs: seq[string]): ShellAst {...}{.
    raises: [Exception, KeyError, OSError, ShellError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [
    RootEffect, ReadEnvEffect, ReadIOEffect, ShellExecEffect, ExecIOEffect,
    WriteIOEffect, ReadDirEffect, WriteDirEffect].}
Copy local packages from host to docker container. Useful if you want to avoid redownloading all packages each time or want to test something with local version of the package before pushing it to github.

Parameters

testDir: Path to temporary directory, mounted in docker container
pkgs: List of packages (by name) that will be copied to docker
proc runDockerTestDevel(startDir, testDir: AbsDir; localDevel: seq[string];

    raises: [Exception, KeyError, OSError, ShellError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [
    RootEffect, ReadEnvEffect, ReadIOEffect, ShellExecEffect, ExecIOEffect,
    WriteIOEffect, ReadDirEffect, WriteDirEffect].}

    ShellExecEffect, ExecIOEffect, ReadEnvEffect, RootEffect].}
